definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
duo1 yuan2 bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

sentences.english: Synthetic method of rosin acid modified terephthalic unsaturated polyester resin (TUPR) was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探討了松香酸改性對苯型不飽和聚酯樹脂的合成方法。

sentences.english: An unsaturated hydrocarbon belonging to the alkene homologous series.
sentences.chinese: 不飽和碳氫化合物，屬於烯烴同系物。

sentences.english: The front housing is made of polycarbonate and the rear housing is made of reinforced unsaturated resins.
sentences.chinese: 前罩殼爲聚炭酸醋，後罩殼爲增強不飽和樹酯。

sentences.english: And, polyunsaturated fats contain essential fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 而且，多不飽和脂肪包含重要的脂肪酸。

sentences.english: Analysis of the composition and content of UFAS in transgenic strains.
sentences.chinese: 第四分析轉基因集胞藻多不飽和脂肪酸的組成和含量。

sentences.english: Thixotropic resin based on ortho-phthalic acid.
sentences.chinese: 觸變型，鄰苯型基體的不飽和聚酯樹脂。

sentences.english: So there's a clear commercial reason for using unsaturated vegetable fats.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有一個明確的使用不飽和植物油的商業理由。

sentences.english: These experimental formulae can be used to predict the boiling points of the hydrocarbons.
sentences.chinese: 應用這些經驗公式可以預測不飽和鏈烴的沸點。
多不飽和脂肪也能降低LDL。

sentences.english: This article discussed the application of 191 unsaturated resin at oil well.
sentences.chinese: 研究了191不飽和聚酯樹脂在油井上應用的配方。

sentences.english: The healthy unsaturated fats seemed to increase successful conception.
sentences.chinese: 健康的不飽和脂肪似乎能夠提高成功受孕的機率。

sentences.english: The other two-thirds are hearthealthy unsaturated fats.
sentences.chinese: 另外三分之二是有益心臟的不飽和脂肪。

sentences.english: is an odorless oil that's high in healthy polyunsaturated fat.
sentences.chinese: 玉米油沒有氣味，健康多不飽和脂肪含量高。

sentences.english: The nutrition and functional properties of MUFA were introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 該文介紹單不飽和脂肪酸的營養及其功能特性。

sentences.english: Rubber seed oil is one of the plant oils rich in polyunsaturated fats.
sentences.chinese: 橡膠種子油是富含多價不飽和脂肪酸的植物油之一。

sentences.english: Monounsaturated fat actually lowers cholesterol level in our body.
sentences.chinese: 單不飽和脂肪酸實際低於體內膽固醇水平。
